Detailed Description

This class is used to return a more descriptive result it is used by chunk item factory methods.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

const std::string &  errorString = "",
bool  onePerChunk = false 
) [inline, explicit]

Constructor.

Parameters:
item The result chunk item, it could be NULL a newly created chunk item or an existing one
errorString A string to describe any error occurred
onePerChunk A boolean indicating whether only one of these items may exist per Chunk.
